com.jp.stocks.service

Interface StockMarketService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StockMarketServiceImpl

    public interface StockMarketService
    Interface for child classes to implement stock market service.

    This class performs calculations in BigDecimal. This is a deliberate decision as these are monitory calculations. Although BigDecimal is more expensive than doubles, accuracy is chosen over performance.

    Please note the methods which are performing calculations will

    return rounded
    result. This rounding can be configured through properties file through properties file. The client who is calling these method can convert the return result to double if required

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BigDecimal calculateDividendYield(String ticker, double price)
      Calculates dividend yield for the given instrument and price For Common stock it will be - (lastDividend/Price) For preferred stock it will be - (fixed Dividend * Par Value)/Price
      double calculateGbceShareIndex()
      Calculates geometric mean for all the stocks.
      BigDecimal calculatePERatio(String ticker, double price)
      Calculates PE Ration for the given instrument and price The calculation will use the formula - (price/dividend) First dividend will be calculated according to the calculateDividendYield(java.lang.String, double) and then use the above formula to calculate PE ratio
      BigDecimal calculateVwapPrice(String ticker)
      Calculates VWAP price for given stock.
      boolean saveStock(Stock stock)
      Saves a given stock to persistence layer.
      boolean saveTrade(Trade trade)
      Saves a given trade to persistence layer.

    • Method Detail

      • calculateDividendYield

        BigDecimal calculateDividendYield(String ticker,
                                  double price)
                           throws InstrumentNotFoundException,
                                  CalculationException
        Calculates dividend yield for the given instrument and price For Common stock it will be - (lastDividend/Price) For preferred stock it will be - (fixed Dividend * Par Value)/Price
        Parameters:
        ticker - Stock symbol to calculate dividend yield
        price - price used in PE ration calculation
        Returns:
        returns calculated dividend yield @BigDecimal
        Throws:
        InstrumentNotFoundException - If the given instrument is not found
        CalculationException - In case of any exceptions while calculation

      • calculatePERatio

        BigDecimal calculatePERatio(String ticker,
                            double price)
                     throws InstrumentNotFoundException,
                            CalculationException
        Calculates PE Ration for the given instrument and price The calculation will use the formula - (price/dividend) First dividend will be calculated according to the calculateDividendYield(java.lang.String, double) and then use the above formula to calculate PE ratio
        Parameters:
        ticker - Stock symbol to calculate PE Ratio
        price - price used in PE ration calculation
        Returns:
        returns calculated PE ratio @BigDecimal
        Throws:
        InstrumentNotFoundException - If the given instrument is not found
        CalculationException - In case of any exceptions while calculation

      • saveTrade

        boolean saveTrade(Trade trade)
        Saves a given trade to persistence layer. This method is a placeholder, it will simply call persistence class to save, any transformation, business logic can be enhanced in future
        Parameters:
        trade - trade details to be saved
        Returns:
        returns success failure as a @Boolean

      • saveStock

        boolean saveStock(Stock stock)
        Saves a given stock to persistence layer. This method is a placeholder, it will simply call persistence class to save, any transformation, business logic can be enhanced in future
        Parameters:
        stock - stock details to be saved
        Returns:
        returns success failure as a @Boolean
